attributes.action: urge the London olympic organisers to change the logo that was unveiled on the 4/6/07.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London Olympic 2012 organisers have unveiled the logo that is set to symbolise the London games of 2012.  The logo is ugly and totally inappropriate for the purpose to which it will be put.  It will age badly and will look dated even before the Games begin.

The prime minister should put pressure on the Olympic committe to think again about this logo.  Further, he should insist that the £400,000 wasted on this symbol be returned to the public purse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
